snippet.title: Drummer uses skills to fight corruption - METAVOIDAL Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game here! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2221780/Metavoidal/

Play as a drummer who sees through the façade of an ominous metal band who has made their base in a cathedral!

Navigate through the dilapidated church overrun with their corruption, and level-up your drumming skills by building your repertoire of metal music.

Build your playlist, grow more skillful and beat your way through the hideous, eldritch band members, one-by-one, to finally escape their influence.

Releasing sometime in June (TBA)! So be sure to add this to your wishlist to keep tabs on when it goes live.
